type.name: org.gradle.api.file.ConfigurableFileTree
type.description:
A FileTree with a single base directory, which can be configured and modified.

You can obtain a ConfigurableFileTree instance by calling org.gradle.api.Project#fileTree(java.util.Map).

method.name: builtBy
method.description:
Registers some tasks which build the files of this collection.
param:tasks The tasks. These are evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Task#dependsOn(Object...).

returns:this

method.name: from
method.description:
Specifies base directory for this file tree using the given path. The path is evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object).
param:dir The base directory.

returns:this

method.name: getBuiltBy
method.description:
Returns the set of tasks which build the files of this collection.

returns:The set. Returns an empty set when there are no such tasks.

method.name: getDir
method.description:
Returns the base directory of this file tree.

returns:The base directory. Never returns null.

method.name: setBuiltBy
method.description:
Sets the tasks which build the files of this collection.
param:tasks The tasks. These are evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Task#dependsOn(Object...).

returns:this

method.name: setDir
method.description:
Specifies base directory for this file tree using the given path. The path is evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object).
param:dir The base directory.

returns:this
